summary: Project to update/refine the app/site layout, including removing the 'motivational videos' section and optionally refining mobile spacing.

existing_features.title: Remove the Motivational Videos / Life Lessons section from the app UI so it is no longer discoverable from primary navigation (sidebar) and no longer presents a videos library experience.

Keep the existing route path '/mental-performance/life-lessons' stable, but ensure it no longer exposes the motivational videos section (e.g., redirect to a remaining Mental Performance page, or show a simple removed-section message with navigation back).

Delete or fully decommission motivational-video-specific frontend modules so there is no remaining dead code or unused assets for this section (page, components, hooks, and content) unless they are still referenced by other active features.

new_feature_requests.summary: Delete the motivational videos section entirely
